welcome.title: Welcome to BitFun
welcome.subtitle: AI Agent-Driven Next-Generation Programming Environment
welcome.description: Let's take a few minutes to complete the initial setup for the best AI programming experience

agentic.title: Agentic
agentic.description: Describe goals, AI plans and delivers

visual.title: Observable
visual.description: Every step is transparent and controllable

extensible.title: Project-Native
extensible.description: Generated code naturally fits your project

language.title: Choose Your Language
language.description: You can change the language anytime in the Settings Center

theme.title: Choose Your Theme
theme.description: Select a theme that suits your preference for a comfortable coding experience

bitfun-light.name: Light
bitfun-light.description: Light theme - Elegant and refined, soft blue-gray tones

bitfun-midnight.name: Midnight
bitfun-midnight.description: Midnight gray dark theme - Professional and elegant, inspired by JetBrains IDE

bitfun-china-style.name: Ink Charm
bitfun-china-style.description: Chinese style theme - Rice paper and ink, blue and vermilion, warm and elegant

bitfun-china-night.name: Ink Night
bitfun-china-night.description: Chinese dark theme - Starlit ink night, moonlight like water, serene and elegant

bitfun-cyber.name: Cyber
bitfun-cyber.description: Tech-style theme - Deep black hole, neon future, ultimate tech aesthetics

bitfun-starry-night.name: Starry Night
bitfun-starry-night.description: Starry theme - Deep night sky, sparkling stars, feel the tranquility and mystery of the universe

bitfun-slate.name: Slate
bitfun-slate.description: Slate gray geometric theme - Deep immersion, high contrast grayscale aesthetics

modes.title: Explore Work Modes
modes.description: BitFun offers multiple work modes for different development scenarios

agentic.name: Agentic Mode
agentic.description: AI-driven execution, automatic planning and coding
features: Auto read/write code and run commands

plan.name: Plan Mode
plan.description: Plan first, execute later for complex tasks

modes.tip: You can switch work modes anytime using the mode switcher

model.title: Configure AI Model
model.description: Configuring an AI model is required to use BitFun. Select a provider and enter your API information

provider.label: Model Provider
provider.customDescription: Manually enter API URL and model information

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: How to get an API Key?

baseUrl.label: API URL
baseUrl.hint: Change this only if you have a custom deployment URL, otherwise keep the default

modelName.label: Model Name
modelName.searchPlaceholder: Search or enter a custom model name...

model.saveHint: Model configuration will be saved automatically after a successful connection test, otherwise it will not be saved

incompleteConfig.title: Model Configuration Incomplete
incompleteConfig.message: The model configuration is incomplete. Continuing will not save it. You can configure it later in the Settings Center.

model.recommended: Recommended: Claude 4.5 Sonnet, DeepSeek V3, GLM-4.7

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.maxTokensHint: Maximum tokens the model can output per request (affects response length)
advanced.contextWindowHint: Maximum context window size supported by the model (for token usage calculation)
advanced.enableThinkingHint: Requires model support for thinking mode
advanced.preserveThinkingHint: Preserve thinking content from previous conversation turns (requires Preserved Thinking support)
advanced.skipSslWarning: Skipping SSL verification poses security risks. Use only in test or internal network environments
advanced.customRequestBodyHint: Enter JSON fields to override default request parameters
advanced.jsonInvalid: Invalid JSON format, please check syntax

completion.title: Setup Complete
completion.subtitle: You're ready to start using BitFun

modelStatus.notConfigured: AI model not configured yet. You can configure it later in the Settings Center.
